steps.step: In the Data Grid, check any or all the checkboxes next to the Contract Number(s) to select the contract data sheet(s) to print.
Click the Result Actions dropdown list.
A new bowser window opens and a File Download dialog box displays with information about the generated PDF contract data sheet.
Click Open (or Save, to save a copy to a location on your computer, instead of printing a copy).
The document opens in your default PDF viewer.
In your PDF viewerâ€™s Menu Bar, click File.
